reviews.review: One of the best games I have ever played. The community is a little toxic though. you also need to spend like 15 bucks to not play with modders and hackers

it good game
addicitive as well
i've had this game for five years and haven't improved at all. 10/10 would rush b no stop again. and again. and again.
Um excelente jogo, a única coisa que estraga são os hackers do free, acho que o jogo deveria voltar a ser pago.
Best game if your are trying to be really skilled on pc games and learn the best strats
This game is a lot of fun! unless there's a 10 year old making fun of you then this game is just- A blast, like I keep saying.
I played a bit (i'm very bad at the game my aim is sooooo bad)
so soldado perigoso e cada um porta um fuzil.

i think its interesting sometimes its the worst but sometimes its the best moments of my life.

it may be garbage, but its a pretty one at that
jogo muito competitivo, porem precisa de horas de treino
love the blood splats on the walls helps tell if you hit your opponent

Игра в которой везёт только тем, кто этого не заслуживает. Тренируешься, оттачиваешь навыки... без полезно ..тут сыновлям шлюх повезёт лучше, чем человеку который 24 на 7 будет тратить своё время на развитие навыков стрельбы и движений
Super Game, wenn man nicht in jeder Runde mit Rnd immer Türken oder Russen hätte!
Muy bueno si queres acribillar macacos filos da puta, pero cuidado con los chiters que hacen que te den ganas de morir x10
Great game. Insane skill cap, if u like games completly based around aim here ya go
if you see this you are ugly
si quires perder 1000 horas de tu vida no jueges este juego ya que la adiccion que te proboca acaba con tigo
в этой игре учат быть садистом, жертв садистов.
CS GO GO GO ! NO CHEAT NO FAKE JUST PLAY SKILL
Les recomiendo y esta muy chido

good morning
The game is awesome and will recommend to others
Cured my depression by making me numb to people telling me to "hang from a tree you disabled minority". 10/10 would recommend
muito bom , espero que o jogo nao seja dominado por hackers, igual eu sai de um ae
Muito bom, porém tem coisas a se melhorar, principalmente quando se trata de  anti-cheats
Best competitive game ever, waiting for source 2
best competitive fps out there. worst, most toxic community around though.
Esta buenardo el juegardo la verdad muchas horas de vicio para que te salga un br rusheando con p90...
hiile cok var 20liraya kasa açıyorsun 10krş cıkıyor 5bin saatim var diğer hesapda oynamıyorum artık
O jogo tem muito hack, perde a graça de jogar
